\documentclass[11pt,a4paper]{article}

% Essential packages
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage{amsmath,amssymb}
\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{geometry}
\usepackage{microtype}

% Page setup
\geometry{margin=1in}

% Hyperref setup
\hypersetup{
    colorlinks=true,
    linkcolor=blue,
    citecolor=blue,
    urlcolor=blue,
    pdftitle={\VAR{title}},
    pdfauthor={\VAR{author}},
}

\title{\VAR{title}}
\author{\VAR{author}\BLOCK{if affiliation} \\ \textit{\VAR{affiliation}}\BLOCK{endif}}
\date{\VAR{date}}

\begin{document}

\maketitle

\BLOCK{if abstract}
\begin{abstract}
\VAR{abstract}
\end{abstract}
\BLOCK{endif}

\BLOCK{for section in sections}
\BLOCK{if section.level == 1}
\section{\VAR{section.name}}
\BLOCK{elif section.level == 2}
\subsection{\VAR{section.name}}
\BLOCK{elif section.level == 3}
\subsubsection{\VAR{section.name}}
\BLOCK{else}
\paragraph{\VAR{section.name}}
\BLOCK{endif}

\VAR{section.content}

\BLOCK{endfor}

% Inline Bibliography
\BLOCK{if references}
\section*{References}
\begin{enumerate}
\BLOCK{for ref in references}
\item \VAR{ref}
\BLOCK{endfor}
\end{enumerate}
\BLOCK{endif}
